cristal-den/scout.about: Just patrolling around Crystal Den, keeping it safe from outsiders looking for trouble.
cristal-den/scout.exit-about: Oh, I see. Well... keep up the good work, then.
cristal-den/scout.intimidated: Please... I don't want to fight, I just want to do my job and get my paycheck. If you kill us here, the whole Crystal Den will come after you. Let's just each walk our way, alright ?
cristal-den/scout.intimidated-exit: It's your lucky day. I'm in a good mood. See you around.
cristal-den/scout.intimidated-fight: I don't give two shit about Crystal Den. I hope you made peace with your goddesses. Your time is up, scum.
cristal-den/scout.look-for-trouble: Hard to believe such as scrawny bunch of clowns could manage any trouble at all.
cristal-den/scout.mark-map: The Cyrstal Den. Biggest town of the Crystal wasteland, buddy. You should head there. Show me your map, I'll mark the town's position for you.
cristal-den/scout.provoked: Poor decision making. Crytal Den doesn't need your type. Go away, or else.
